title: For you madam. [No. 68/02] = Pour vous madame
brief_description: Cinemagazine items including: 1. French skiing team training after Grenoble Olympics. 2. 1968 Paris fashions from Balmain and Lapideus. 3. Apparitional painting styles of Jean Latourlan in Brittany. 4. Rhythmic gymnastics class for instructors in Paris.
